name: Centiskorch
description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

attacks.name: Hundred Foot Flames
attacks.effect: For each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon, discard the top card of your opponent’s deck.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.
